name: DarkerDev
description: A simple dark theme for hyperdev.com, and support.hyperweb.space.
additional_info: To change the actual editors theme: If you have greasemonkey installed the link below should enable Ambiance on HyperDev: (I think Ambiance fits best) Ambiance Lots of people like Monokai though: Monokai And you could just edit it through the greasemonkey script manager and easily change the theme it sets if you want a different one. Ace Editor Themes If you'd like to improve it, or have done so for yourself, please leave the changes as a comment below and I'll update it (and credit you). Or send a pull request https://github.com/qk4/userstyles If you've made/found a better dark style for Hyper Dev let me know! I started this one because I found none.
